sentence.Network_en: She worked indefatigably and enthusiastically to interest the young in music.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了激发年轻人对音乐的兴趣，她一直孜孜不倦、积极热情地工作。
公告受到人们的热烈欢迎。
他一丝不苟、满怀热情地学习。

entry.tran: 非常感兴趣的;热心的;热情的
entry.def: If you are enthusiastic about something, you show how much you like or enjoy it by the way that you behave and talk.

example.ex: Tom was very enthusiastic about the place...
example.tran: 汤姆对那个地方非常感兴趣。

example.ex: Bob Dole seemed less than enthusiastic about the proposed move.
example.tran: 鲍勃·多尔似乎对提议的这项行动不太感兴趣。

means.word_mean: 1. with enthusiasm; in an enthusiastic manner;
2. in a lavish or enthusiastic manner;

auth_sentence.content: He did his job enthusiastically even ecstatically and well.
auth_sentence.res_content: He did his job enthusiastically even ecstatically and well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He did his job enthusiastically even ecstatically and well.

auth_sentence.content: They whirled their hips enthusiastically for a few minutes.
auth_sentence.res_content: They whirled their hips enthusiastically for a few minutes.

auth_sentence.content: The city welcomes everybody enthusiastically, he said.

sentences.en: Rather over enthusiastically,he tried to do it all himself.
sentences.cn: 他有些过分热心了,想一个人把工作全做了。

sentences.en: Conveniently overlooking the fact that she wouldn’t be able to meet the commitment, she agreed enthusiastically.
sentences.cn: 她不理会自己不能遵守承诺的事实，热心地答应了。

sentences.en: Critics enthusiastically acclaimed the new play.
sentences.cn: 评论家们热情洋溢地称赞这部新剧。

sentences.en: Other countries have adopted this political creed enthusiastically.
sentences.cn: 其他国家狂热地采纳了这一政治信条。
